knimeNode.name: Unpivoting
knimeNode.shortDescription: Node rotates a number of selected value columns into one single column and at the same time duplicates each single row by the number of selected value columns.

fullDescription.intro: Node rotates a number of selected value columns into one single column and at the same time duplicates each single row by the number of selected value columns.
fullDescription.option: Select columns to be rotated into one single column. one single column.
Select columns to be duplicated by the number of selected value columns.
Select, if hiliting is enabled between input and output data.
Skip all rows containing missing cells in selected value column(s).

ports.inPort: Input table with at least on value column for the unpivoting operation.
ports.outPort: Unpivoting table with duplicated columns together with one rotated value column and their corresponding column names.
